reviewText: Great video.  It talks about horsinality and gives good examples.  There is a competition with other parelli riders that is fun to watch and be inspired.  Happy to add to the collection.

This was a dvd to replace one, that I had lost, because it was so good! If you love horses and are the slightest bit interested in working with your horse or understanding why they do what they do -or just want an interesting and fun show this is the one for you.
You will be entertained and enjoy every minute I still watch it over and over and they are the very best at what they do!
